name: Private Social Networks
overview:
Private Social Networks® is a technology Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company offering an operational solution leveraging a unique community/sub community architecture for organizations to create their own private branded communities with a robust, integrated set of features and capabilities in a secure HIPAA compliant environment built on a robust content management and authentication foundation.

Any organization that needs to brand, create, and maintain & control (members and content) can leverage our solution and with our unique bi-directional, multi-lingual translation capabilities of both user interface and user content. Our platform is offered as a cloud-based service based on a subscription business model.

Self-funded-to-date with a strong executive team, our product is on version 5 with customer and actively engaging new prospects. We are now seeking our 1st external round of funding to expand and put “feet on the street” to execute our go-to-market strategy.

Platform has/includes o leverages an exclusive community and sub community architecture o unique bi-directional, multi-lingual translation capabilities of both user interface and user content (currently 57 languages) o exclusive content monitor and filtering capabilities with alert feature o robust role-based profile management o eLearning module with testing (e.g., patient education, nurse in-service training, new employee/volunteer education) o Video conferencing and presentation features for one-on-many or one-on-one with recording capabilities (e.g., education, research, consultation, follow-up) o Device independent (desktop, laptop, notebook, tablet, smartphone)
